format: html
execute: 
  echo: false
---


```{r}
# load required packages
if (!requireNamespace("DT", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("DT")
}
library(DT)

# read CSV (put your CSV in data/data.csv)
df <- read.csv("data/journals.csv")

# render DT datatable with search box, column filters
datatable(
  df,
  filter = 'top',       # per-column filters
  options = list(
    pageLength = 25,
    lengthMenu = c(10,25,50,100),
    search = list(regex = TRUE, caseInsensitive = TRUE)
  ),
  rownames = FALSE,
  class = 'stripe hover compact'
)

```
